pages.title: Note: Grief
pages.text: I see what $(h)She$(/h) meant about an $(item)accursed metal$() now. Even touching this $(item)Netherite$() burns, the pain centered around my $(item)ring$(). The metal is poison to them; and it is now poison to me too.$(br)I must find a $(thing)cure$() to its corruption, but for now I should $(key)avoid any direct contact with the material$().
